## IConversationStore.getMembers() method

Get members of a conversation

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getMembers(conversationId: ConversationId): Promise<IMember[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  conversationId | <code>ConversationId</code> | The conversation to get members for |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<IMember[]>`

All members of the conversation
